name: Diapers
description: Client is a divorced single mother with 4 children. Currently two young children are under her care ( F, 11y/o and F, 1y/o), while her two other children are under the care of her ex-husband. Client stays with her mother as well, and is the main breadwinner of the family. However, due to the nature of Client's job, there are months where her income is little, resulting in tight living expenses, adding on to her stressors as a single mother. As such temporary support with diapers and milk powder would help to alleviate some of her financial stressors.
specifications: Fair Price Baby Dry Tape (XL) High Absorbancy

name: Diapers
description:
OffSpring Diapers Pull Up 2XL

This family has four school-aged children and one toddler. They are a low-income family with both parents working hard to make ends meet and ensure their kids' needs are met. With no relatives to support them, they are on their own.

Given the current rise in living costs, maintaining their daily essentials is becoming increasingly difficult. Assistance with diapers would be greatly appreciated and would help ease their burden. Your support can make a meaningful difference in their lives.

passiton.name: BW Generation tape diapers (Size M)
passiton.description:
We have 2 pkts of the above diapers. Please find product link here for reference: https://www.geriatriccare.asia/product/ultra-wrappers-medium-10-per-pack/

We are unable to cover delivery fees. Please arrange for own delivery.

name: Diapers
description: Family is a low income family with 7 kids. Mother is the main breadwinner while father is the caregiver. She usually earns enough for the family, and the family is on financial assistance as well. However, as mother has been sick this month and was even hospitalized (overwork), the family is experiecing financial difficulties (mum works as a sales person and if she does not work and earn commision, she does not earn enough for the family). Husband is trying to look for a part-time job, but that will take some time too. FSC has provided them with some emergency cash this month for their basic needs but they need some support for diapers. They have 2 young children still on diapers and it would be helpful if they can get 4 packets of L and XL diapers each for each child (any brand is fine). This should last them for 1 month plus till mother feels better and the family's financial situation stabilises a bit. It would be helpful if they can get a few tins of Lactogen 3 too as the current tins that they have can only last for a few more weeks. Thank you for supporting the family, please feel free to reach out to me through email should you require more information.

passiton.name: BW Generation tape diapers (Size M)
passiton.description:
We have 2 pkts of the above diapers. Please find product link here for reference: https://www.geriatriccare.asia/product/ultra-wrappers-medium-10-per-pack/

We are unable to cover delivery fees. Please arrange for own delivery.

name: TV
description:
A 73year old gentleman, after spending some time in the transitional shelter, finally managed to get a public housing rental flat. Even though of age, he is still working. To ease his financial burden, he like to request for a TV for his new 1 room flat,which he sharing with another senior, so that they can get suitable entertainment during their free time.   Appreciate if donor can deliver the item to their unit too.

If this speaks to you, please email their social worker (anntat@newhopecs.org.sg) or whatsapp him at 87952925

Thank you for your kindness.
